subsection.name: What is Apache Camel - Hippo Events Support?
subsection.p: Apache Camel - Hippo Events Support provides hippoevent: Apache Camel component, Camel Repository Scheduler Job component which can invoke a Camel Endpoint URI, and utility classes to help integration between Hippo CMS/Repository and Apache Camel.
The hippoevent: component is used for subscribing HippoEvent through Event Bus.

The Camel Repository Scheduler Job component can be configured for a scheduled task and it can invoke a Camel Endpoint URI based on configuration. This makes it easier to create a scheduler task based on Repository Scheduler.
The demo project contains many useful example scenarios, solutions and other information. Please see About Demo Project for detail.
